sentences: Dave Georgeff (born February 28, 1968 in Naperville, Illinois) is an American musician.

Dave Georgeff (born February 28, 1968 in Naperville, Illinois) is an American musician. Born in Naperville, Illinois, and raised in nearby Downers Grove, Georgeff is a graduate of the Musicians Institute in Los Angeles, California.
Georgeff is a member of the Los Angeles indie rock combo, Sign of the Fox.
He previously played bass guitar with mid-1990s Interscope-signed California pop punk band, Wax.

He previously played bass guitar with mid-1990s Interscope-signed California pop punk band, Wax. Wax gained notoriety for their music videos, directed by Spike Jonze, which received considerable play on MTV in the mid-1990s.
Georgeff long-ago adopted the alter-ego "Burdie Cutlass," and veterans of the California punk scene still call him that to this day.
